ch.phonon

Class TEMAllied

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.phonon.TEMAllied

  • public class TEMAllied
extends java.lang.Object
    TEMAllied stores all information generated or related to TEM pictures loaded. The picture is so to say the seeding entity of all associated containers. The class allows to store polygons, scales, pictures, picture information.
    Author:
    phonon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TEMAllied()
      Initializes any empty TEMAllied container that can is used as a first view onto the temView before another TEMAllied instance is displayed.
      TEMAllied(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image, java.lang.String fileName)
      Initializes the TEMAllied container and directly loads it with a basic TEM picture.
      TEMAllied(java.lang.String fileName)
      Initializes an empty TEMAllied container, loads one picture from the hard disk and extends the information string directly about the file name by concatenation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TEMAllied

        public TEMAllied()
        Initializes any empty TEMAllied container that can is used as a first view onto the temView before another TEMAllied instance is displayed. The information associated to this standard instance informs the user about, that there is no picture loaded.

      • TEMAllied

        public TEMAllied(java.lang.String fileName)
        Initializes an empty TEMAllied container, loads one picture from the hard disk and extends the information string directly about the file name by concatenation.
        Parameters:
        fileName - of the TEM picture to be loaded into the TEMAllied container

      • TEMAllied

        public TEMAllied(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
         java.lang.String fileName)
        Initializes the TEMAllied container and directly loads it with a basic TEM picture. The file name added is concatenated to the general information prefix.
        Parameters:
        image -
        fileName -

      • removePoint

        public boolean removePoint(int x,
                  int y)
        Removes an Drawable point that's coordinates in tem view space are given by the x and y coordinate.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate in the tem view canvas
        y - coordinate in the tem view canvas
        Returns:
        success of operation

      • addDrawable

        public void addDrawable(Drawable drawable)
        Adds an additional Drawable to the list of Drawables that should be plotted on top of the TEM picture. the last added is on top.
        Parameters:
        drawable - to be added.
